Desc.eng: RAARGH! Let! Me! Out! RAARGH! I AM INNOCENT!
I'm... a simple librarian with... AARH... an addiction... Drank too much of... HRRR... Dr. Jekyll's Anger Management drinks... and stayed this way!
Everyone deserves a second chance. You can go.
And how can I be sure that you'll turn back normal? I can't let you free.
